name: Devwill Too Prologue
overview: Devwill Too Prologue is a sort of prequel for Devwill Too MD. Now you play as one of the Yellow Homunculus in search for a reason for you existence. The game was made too like a remake from the 8 bit (ZX Spectrum / MSX) Devwill Too version, expanded and reworked with new 16 Bit assets.
